Articles.Content:
Hello people, I'm not dead! I also didn't know where to post this, so let's let er' rip.

This past Sunday, I lost the charger to my Mac I'm using now. I couldn't use it even if I had Wi-Fi, so I couldn't talk to you guys for a week. Now though, I found the charger again, so I've got tonight to be here. However, tomorrow I am getting on a plane to Orlando, Florida. I will spend a day there (without Wi-Fi), and then I will go on a week-long cruise (with NO WI-FI!!!) Then, finally, I will have access to here again. (But even then, I will be attending my duties in September again, so my activity won't stop, but certainly slow down.) So that's all I have to say, and goodbye. Cheers, Raincrafter. Now I have to PM this to my friends. This is going to be a long night.
Enjoy your cruise Raincrafter, see you later
In the last month I traveled both to South Carolina and Florida in two separate trips. I found that as long as you enjoy yourself, the vacation time is very nice. Enjoy your cruise!
Why would you be dead if you didn't post for a week? i upload less than that and people still don't notice me.

*Dials 9...1...* Hello! Glad to see you're not dead. Had my doubts there for a moment. *presses 1* Operator? No, no, heh heh, it's an accident, heh heh... No, operator, no need to send the cops. You're going to anyway? Well, OK then. Bye RAINCRAFTER, go to go!
Oh the irony. I will have to go as you get back, in a way that abducts me 5 days a week.
